statements: UPDATE advertising_guidelines SET advertising_rules='No deceptive advertising allowed' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE advertising_guidelines SET ethical_standards='Follow ethical advertising practices' WHERE platform_name='Google';
UPDATE advertising_guidelines SET advertising_rules = 'Updated rules', ethical_standards = 'Updated standards' WHERE id = 1
UPDATE advertising_guidelines SET platform_name = 'New Platform', ethical_standards = 'Revised standards', advertising_rules = 'Revised rules' WHERE id = 2
UPDATE advertising_guidelines SET guidelines = 'Revised guidelines for social media ads' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE ar_platforms SET user_feedback = 'Positive feedback from users on new features' WHERE platform_name = 'ARCore';
UPDATE advertising_guidelines SET ad_content = 'New Ad Content', guidelines = 'Updated Guidelines' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE ar_platforms SET user_feedback = 'Positive Feedback' WHERE platform_name = 'AR Platform X';
UPDATE Guidelines SET description = 'Modern guidelines for effective marketing', guideline_title = 'Marketing Guidelines' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Advertisements SET ad_name = 'Summer Sale', ad_content = 'Amazing discounts on all products', ad_type = 'Banner' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE Guidelines SET guideline_title = 'New Guideline Title', description = 'Updated Description' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Advertisements SET ad_type = 'New Ad Type', ad_name = 'Updated Ad Name', platform = 'Social Media', ad_content = 'New Ad Content' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE guidelines SET category = 'New Category' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE advertisers SET industry = 'Technology' WHERE name = 'ABC Corp';
UPDATE guidelines SET category = 'Tech' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE campaigns SET end_date = '2023-12-31' WHERE name = 'Holiday Sale';
UPDATE guidelines SET category = 'Health', description = 'Health and Wellness guidelines' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE advertisers SET email = 'info@example.com', website='www.example.com' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE guidelines SET category = 'Healthcare', description = 'Updated healthcare guidelines for 2022' WHERE id = 1
UPDATE advertisers SET website = 'www.newwebsite.com', name = 'New Advertiser Name' WHERE id = 3
